name: John Brown
description: John is an experienced rugby coach and player who joined the UNCC rugby team in 2011 after a successful career in England. With over 15 years of experience coaching rugby, including at high-performance levels, he brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the team.

name: Johno Basnett
description: Johno Basnette is a highly skilled and experienced rugby coach who has been coaching the UNCC rugby team since 2018. With a background in playing and coaching rugby at various levels in South Africa and the USA, he brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the team.

name: Robert McCachren
description: Robert McCachren is a dedicated and experienced rugby coach who has been coaching the UNCC rugby team since 2022. With a background in playing and coaching rugby at various levels, including collegiate and international competitions, Robert brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the team. His passion for the sport and commitment to excellence have helped the team achieve significant success on and off the field.
